## Source: ossf-package-analysis (43464fc161a21912ec5eb0ef0d679eae00bc21da29e9e57c701193ea7a33cbb6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'lightsuq' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
